member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocBuilderExtensions.UseReDoc(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Register the ReDoc middleware with provided options

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocBuilderExtensions.UseReDoc(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions})
member.summary: Register the ReDoc middleware with optional setup action for DI-injected options

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.InjectStylesheet(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Injects additional CSS stylesheets into the index.html page
member.param: A path to the stylesheet - i.e. the link "href" attribute
The target media - i.e. the link "media" attribute

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.SpecUrl(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Swagger JSON endpoint. Can be fully-qualified or relative to the redoc page

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.EnableUntrustedSpec(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: If enabled, the spec is considered untrusted and all HTML/markdown is sanitized to prevent XSS. Disabled by default for performance reasons. Enable this option if you work with untrusted user data!

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.ScrollYOffset(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies a vertical scroll-offset in pixels. This is often useful when there are fixed positioned elements at the top of the page, such as navbars, headers etc

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.HideHostname(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Controls if the protocol and hostname is shown in the operation definition

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.HideDownloadButton(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Do not show "Download" spec button. THIS DOESN'T MAKE YOUR SPEC PRIVATE, it just hides the button

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.ExpandResponses(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Specify which responses to expand by default by response codes. Values should be passed as comma-separated list without spaces e.g. "200,201". Special value "all" expands all responses by default. Be careful: this option can slow-down documentation rendering time. Default is "all"

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.RequiredPropsFirst(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Show required properties first ordered in the same order as in required array

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.NoAutoAuth(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Do not inject Authentication section automatically

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.PathInMiddlePanel(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Show path link and HTTP verb in the middle panel instead of the right one

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.HideLoading(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Do not show loading animation. Useful for small docs

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.NativeScrollbars(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Use native scrollbar for sidemenu instead of perfect-scroll (scrolling performance optimization for big specs)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.DisableSearch(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Disable search indexing and search box

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.OnlyRequiredInSamples(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Show only required fields in request samples

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ReDocOptionsExtensions.SortPropsAlphabetically(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions)
member.summary: Sort properties alphabetically

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions.RoutePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a route prefix for accessing the redoc page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions.IndexStream
member.summary: Gets or sets a Stream function for retrieving the redoc page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a title for the redoc page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions.HeadContent
member.summary: Gets or sets additional content to place in the head of the redoc page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ReDocOptions.SpecUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger JSON endpoint. Can be fully-qualified or relative to the redoc page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.UntrustedSpec
member.summary: If set, the spec is considered untrusted and all HTML/markdown is sanitized to prevent XSS. Disabled by default for performance reasons. Enable this option if you work with untrusted user data!

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.ScrollYOffset
member.summary: If set, specifies a vertical scroll-offset in pixels. This is often useful when there are fixed positioned elements at the top of the page, such as navbars, headers etc

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.HideHostname
member.summary: If set, the protocol and hostname is not shown in the operation definition

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.HideDownloadButton
member.summary: Do not show "Download" spec button. THIS DOESN'T MAKE YOUR SPEC PRIVATE, it just hides the button

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.ExpandResponses
member.summary: Specify which responses to expand by default by response codes. Values should be passed as comma-separated list without spaces e.g. "200,201". Special value "all" expands all responses by default. Be careful: this option can slow-down documentation rendering time.

member.summary: Show required properties first ordered in the same order as in required array

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.NoAutoAuth
member.summary: Do not inject Authentication section automatically

member.summary: Show path link and HTTP verb in the middle panel instead of the right one

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.HideLoading
member.summary: Do not show loading animation. Useful for small docs

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.NativeScrollbars
member.summary: Use native scrollbar for sidemenu instead of perfect-scroll (scrolling performance optimization for big specs)

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.ReDoc.ConfigObject.DisableSearch
member.summary: Disable search indexing and search box

member.summary: Show only required fields in request samples
